definition: Describing an insertion procedure of a probe.

description.value: Insertion of a probe in the Visual Cortex.

alternatives.v1bl: Primary visual cortex, binocular area, right hemisphere
alternatives.v1ml: Primary visual cortex, monocular area, right hemisphere
alternatives.v2bl: Secondary visual cortex, lateral area, right hemisphere
alternatives.v2ml: Secondary visual cortex, medial area, right hemisphere

location.definition: Describes the brain area of insertion

name: malin_implant_drive_probe

position_reference.definition: By default position are specified by the coordinates of skull. Use this property for other definitions.

ref_electrode_location.definition: Describes the location of the reference electrode.
